levels.title: The Mysterious Lab
levels.story: You find yourself locked in a strange laboratory. The door is sealed with an electronic lock that requires a password. On the desk, you notice a note with a riddle: "I'm light as a feather, but even the strongest person cannot hold me for more than a few minutes."
levels.hint: Hint: What can't be held for long, no matter how strong you are?

levels.title: Hidden Files
levels.story: The screen flickers and reveals a hidden computer terminal. There seems to be important files locked behind another password. The terminal displays: "To proceed, answer this: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?"
levels.hint: Hint: Something you might use to navigate...

levels.title: The Final Code
levels.story: You've uncovered a secret file that contains coordinates to a hidden vault. But there's one last security measure. A prompt appears: "What has keys but no locks, space but no room, and you can enter but not exit?"
levels.hint: Hint: You're using one right now to type...

success.title: Escape Successful!
success.message: Congratulations! You've solved all the puzzles and escaped the mysterious lab. The secrets you've uncovered will change everything...

levels.title: The Sealed Chamber
levels.story: You find yourself in a dimly lit chamber with stone walls. A large door blocks your way, and an inscription above reads: 'I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind.'
levels.hint: Hint: Something you can hear but cannot see...

levels.title: The Ancient Vault
levels.story: Beyond the chamber, you enter a vast hall filled with ancient relics. A pedestal in the center holds a locked box, and a riddle is etched onto its surface: 'The more of me you take, the more you leave behind.'
levels.hint: Hint: Something left behind as you move...

levels.title: The Final Barrier
levels.story: Inside the vault, a golden door stands before you, with one final challenge inscribed: 'I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?'
levels.hint: Hint: Something humorous, but also something that can be deciphered...

success.title: Escape Complete!
success.message: Congratulations! You have solved all the riddles and escaped the mysterious ruins. The knowledge you have gained will serve you well in the adventures to come...
